about_the_game:
In "Lethal Infiltration: Ghost Reconnaissance" players step into the boots of Ethan Hayes, a skilled operative within the clandestine unit known as "Ghost Reconnaissance." With global tensions escalating and the specter of cyber terrorism looming large, Ethan is tasked with infiltrating terrorist strongholds, gathering vital intelligence, and executing precision strikes to avert the outbreak of worldwide conflict.

Immersed in the gritty world of modern espionage, players navigate diverse environments using cutting-edge equipment and weaponry. With Ethan's expertise in stealth and combat, players engage in adrenaline-fueled action, uncovering a web of intrigue that threatens to disrupt global stability.

Featuring over 20 hours of gameplay, "Lethal Infiltration: Ghost Reconnaissance" offers a range of mission objectives that can be approached in various ways, ensuring a thrilling and replayable experience. Prepare to embark on a heart-pounding journey where every decision shapes the fate of nations, and the line between ally and enemy blurs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 200 Series or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or AMD/Nvidia equivalent for Mac
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
